'''''Amon Hen'' 259''' is the two-hundred-and-fifty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in May [[2016]].

==Contents==

* Cover: ''The Old Forest''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Artwork: ''Anborn''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Announcements
* Seminar Announcement
* Oxonmoot Announcement
* The Burning [[Palantíri|Palantír]] 19
** By: Ian Collier
* All Brân
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Report: Springmoots and Secret Vices
** By: Ian Collier
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Ian Collier
* [[Tharbad]] - the 'real' Oxford on the map of [[Middle-earth]]?
** By: Irina Metzler
* Review: ''[[Tolkien: The Illustrated Encyclopedia|Tolkien - An Illustrated Atlas]]''
** By: [[Shaun Gunner]]
* Review: ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Chronicles: Art & Design]]''
** By: Shaun Gunner
* News From [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Mathom
** By: Jan Boom
* Michael's Miscellany
** By: Michael Flowers
* Artwork: ''[[Gandalf]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* New Members
* Artwork: ''[[Boromir]] and [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* Committee
